means: 取消，收回，撤回( unsay的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Bill Bradley says too much is going unsaid between blacks and whites.
sentence.Network_cn: 比尔·布莱德利说黑人和白人之间有太多没有明说的东西。

sentence.Network_en: Some things, Donald, are better left unsaid.
sentence.Network_cn: 唐纳德，有些事还是不说为好。

sentence.Network_en: Some things are better left unsaid .
sentence.Network_cn: 有些事情还是不说出来好。

在阅读奈尔．亚布兰森 ( Neil Abramson) 的《那些没说的话》( Unsaid )，我的脑海中自然浮出两个对比的故事：其一是：日本古典小 …
近期文... ... Fifty Shades of Grey 葛雷的50道阴影：首部曲 Unsaid 那些没説的话 The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel 金盏花大酒店.

list.abs: 迪斯尼电影的插曲和片尾曲 -... ... mcfly-05-hypnotised 着迷. mcfly-10-unsaid things 来不及说. mcfly-11-not alone 不孤单.
and leave it still unsaid in part., 而留下仍未说出口的部分.
leave的... ... leave nothing to be desired 完美无缺 leave nothing unsaid 和盘托出 leave one holding the sack 让某人背黑锅.
enraged by things unsaid and empty beds and bad behavior ., 因没说的话和空床及不好行为被激怒.

entry.def: If something is left unsaid or goes unsaid in a particular situation, it is not said, although you might have expected it to be said.

example.ex: Some things, Donald, are better left unsaid...
example.tran: 唐纳德，有些事还是不说为好。

example.ex: What she and her characters leave unsaid is often more important than what they actually put into words...
example.tran: 她和她作品中的角色避而不谈的内容往往比明言的更为重要。

sentences.sentence: "his action is clear but his reason remains unstated"

auth_sentence.content: Your stories seem to imply so much unsaid.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your stories seem to imply so much unsaid.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your stories seem to imply so much unsaid.

auth_sentence.content: What is often unsaid can say a lot more than what is.
auth_sentence.res_content: What is often unsaid can say a lot more than what is.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What is often unsaid can say a lot more than what is.

auth_sentence.content: But what remains unsaid is that among the four accused, Dinh holds the highest profile in the West.
auth_sentence.res_content: But what remains unsaid is that among the four accused, Dinh holds the highest profile in the West.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But what remains unsaid is that among the four accused, Dinh holds the highest profile in the West.

sentences.en: It was what she left unsaid that worried me.
sentences.cn: 叫我担心的是她觉察到而未说出的。
